functionDescription: This function handles error throwing in the Lua interpreter. If the thread has an error handler, it sets the status and jumps to it. If not, it checks if the main thread has a handler and re-throws the error there. If no handler is available, it calls a panic function or aborts.

inoutInterfaces.name: L
inoutInterfaces.meaning: Pointer to the Lua state where the error is being handled.
